game.name: GUNSHIP
game.shortDescription: Really short game of Gunship. Experience the thrill of being part of a powerful military aircraft in Gunship. With advanced weapons and technology at your disposal, take down enemy targets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Really short game of Gunship. Experience the thrill of being part of a powerful military aircraft in Gunship. With advanced weapons and technology at your disposal, take down enemy targets.

reviewHighlights.text: bought it dirt cheap on sale, played for 5 minutes got all but 1 achevement in that time. Game has one mission never very clear, cleared the whole map...
for the price it's entertaining. it needs updates with waves, levels, voice lines etc. but it's honestly a entertaining for what it is.
